00088 
00089 Ray* TSeparatorKit::Intersect( const Ray& ray, RandomDeviate& rand ) const
00090 {
00091         Trace trace( "TSeparatorKit::Intersect", false );
00092         
00093         //Test if the ray intersects with this bounding box
00094         SbBox3f box= m_boundigBox.project();
00095         
00096         double t0 = ray.mint;
00097         double t1 = ray.maxt;
00098 
00099     for( int i = 0; i < 3; ++i )
00100     {
00101         double invRayDir = 1.0 / ray.direction[i];
00102         double tNear = ( box.getMin()[i] - ray.origin[i] ) * invRayDir;
00103         double tFar = ( box.getMax()[i] - ray.origin[i] ) * invRayDir;
00104         if( tNear > tFar ) std::swap( tNear, tFar );
00105         t0 = tNear > t0 ? tNear : t0;
00106         t1 = tFar < t1 ? tFar : t1;
00107         if( t0 > t1 ) return 0;
00108     }
00109    
00110         Ray* result = 0;
00111          
00112         //The ray intersects with the BoundingBox
00113         //Transform the ray to call children intersect
00114         SoTransform* coinTransform = static_cast< SoTransform* > ( transform.getValue() );
00115         if ( coinTransform )
00116         {
00117                 Transform objectToWorld( *coinTransform );
00118                 Transform worldToObject = objectToWorld.GetInverse();
00119                 
00120                 Ray objectRay( worldToObject( ray ) );                                   
00121                 objectRay.maxt = ray.maxt;
00122                 
00123                 Ray* reflected = 0;
00124                 Ray* childReflected = 0;
00125                 
00126                 SoNodeKitListPart* coinPartList = dynamic_cast< SoNodeKitListPart* >( childList.getValue() );
00127                 
00128                 if( coinPartList )
00129                 { 
00130                         for( int index = 0; index < coinPartList->getNumChildren(); index++ )
00131                         {
00132                                 SoBaseKit* coinChild = dynamic_cast< SoBaseKit* >( coinPartList->getChild( index ) );
00133                                 if( coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TSeparatorKit::getClassTypeId() ) )
00134                                 {
00135                                         TSeparatorKit* child = dynamic_cast< TSeparatorKit* >( coinChild );
00136                                         childReflected = child->Intersect( objectRay, rand );
00137                                 }
00138                                 else if(coinChild->getTypeId().isDerivedFrom( TShapeKit::getClassTypeId() ) ) 
00139                                 {
00140                                         TShapeKit* child = dynamic_cast< TShapeKit* >( coinChild );
00141                                         childReflected = child->Intersect( objectRay, rand );
00142                                         
00143                                 }
00144                                 
00145                                 if( ray.maxt != objectRay.maxt )
00146                                 {
00147                                         delete reflected;
00148                                         reflected = 0;                  
00149                                     ray.maxt = objectRay.maxt;
00150                                 }
00151                                 
00152                                 if( childReflected ) 
00153                                 {
00154                                     reflected = new Ray( *childReflected );
00155                                     delete childReflected;
00156                                     childReflected = 0;
00157                                 }
00158                         }
00159                         
00160                         if( reflected ) 
00161                         {       
00162                                 result = new Ray( objectToWorld( *reflected ) );        
00163                                 delete reflected;
00164                                 reflected = 0;
00165                         }
00166                 }       
00167         }               
00168         return result;  
00169 }
